My Projects

What is this?

On the right you should see a table that is a live view of what is on my github. I used the github API to get the data from "https://api.github.com/users/joshhamwee/repos" and from this I extracted the JSON data, and filtered it to take the data that I required. This was my first project using Javascript and JSON.
